comments.snippet:
Implemented a compatibility hardening pass in my fork for this SQL schema edge case and validated it in CI. 
 
What changed: 
- always load SQL reader schema even when `tblCons` has 0 rows 
- auto-add missing serializer-required columns when source SQL schema is partial/outdated 
- regression test added for missing-column source schema 
 
Fork commit: https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/commit/cd6eee37
